availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Simpson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Jane Pope Wright in Allen County, Kentucky, on June 22, 1840. Father of Mary E. Wright, Nancy C. Wright, and Martha A. Wright. Farmer in Simpson County, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Simpson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 342-3.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 305B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Allen County Marriages, Film #000851644, p. 28.
Find A Grave, "Merrick Wright (18 Apr 1820-27 Dec 1908)," Memorial #5546571, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/5546571 (accessed August 25, 2020).
